page.title: 16SHOPS IN WISBOROUGH GREEN
page.content: In Wisborough Green there is a small supermarket called Eversheds. You can buy drinks, chocolate and icecream. You can buy bread and things in tin cans. You can buy yoghurt, butter, margarine, cakes and things you can write with. You choose the things you want to buy and take them to the lady at the cash till to pay for them. If you go to the green grocers called Panda you ask for the fruit and vegetables that you buy. They are weighed and then you pay for them. At the butchers called Kevin Haycock's you ask for the meat you want and wait to be served. There is also a hairdressers shop where children and ladies have their hair done. The other two shops sell antiques, selling old furniture,glass and china.
